description: Retrieves details about a specific endpoint for a model from Amazon Bedrock Marketplace.

parameters.name: endpointArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint you want to get information about.

nested_items.name: endpointArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: modelSourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ARN of the model from Amazon Bedrock Marketplace that is deployed on this endpoint.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The overall status of the endpoint in Amazon Bedrock Marketplace (e.g., ACTIVE, INACTIVE).

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: Additional information about the overall status, if available.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the endpoint was registered.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the endpoint was last updated.

nested_items.name: endpointConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of the endpoint, including the number and type of instances used.

nested_items.name: sageMaker
nested_items.description: The configuration specific to Amazon SageMaker for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: initialInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of Amazon EC2 compute instances to deploy for initial endpoint creation.

nested_items.name: instanceType
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 compute instance type to deploy for hosting the model.

nested_items.name: executionRole
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Amazon SageMaker can assume to access model artifacts and docker image for deployment on Amazon EC2 compute instances or for batch transform jobs.

nested_items.name: kmsEncryptionKey
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services KMS key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data on the storage volume attached to the Amazon EC2 compute instance that hosts the endpoint.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: An array of IDs for each subnet in the VPC to use.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: An array of IDs for each security group in the VPC to use.

nested_items.name: endpointStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the endpoint (e.g., Creating, InService, Updating, Failed).

nested_items.name: endpointStatusMessage
nested_items.description: Additional information about the endpoint status, if available.
